name: Terrarium [PRE-ALPHA] [V0.3]
description:
Follow us on Twitter to stay up to date!

Terrarium is a cozy 2D sandbox game that lets you explore capsules in time. Players take on the role of a traveler who is exploring key points in New Zealand's history. Travel around the country, visiting various locations and interacting with the people and places they come across. Along the way, they will learn more about the history, culture, and geography of New Zealand.

  • Witness the impact of deforestation and the introduction of invasive species on the environment.
  • Gain an appreciation for New Zealand's rich history and culture.
  • Build relationships with the local inhabitants.
  • Fishing
  • Crafting
  • Building
  • Farming
